```{r}
# Calculate the total number of different RNA strings
calculate_rna_strings <- function(protein_str, rna_codon_table) {
  # Initialize count for stop codon
  count <- 3

  for (i in 1:nchar(protein_str)) {
    amino_acid <- substr(protein_str, i, i)
    count <- (count * length(which(unlist(rna_codon_table) == amino_acid))) %% 1000000
  }

  return (count)
}

# Call the function with the protein string
protein_string <- ""
total_rna_strings <- calculate_rna_strings(protein_string, rna_codon_table)
print(total_rna_strings)

```
